testsuite.name: com.example.poc.test.VisionIndicatorTest
testsuite.system-out: Open the URL.:- https://scorecard.worldbank.org/en/home Assert that the VISION link is present. Navigate to the Vision tab

Verify whether the line chart is displayed by default on the page for the Percentage of population living in poverty (at $2.15/day and $6.85/day)vision indicator Assert that the Line Chart is present. Verify tooltip present with the Excel Read the tooltip Postion :- x: 223 y: 28 Navigate to Vision Indicator Detail Page
